 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחָבָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==rag, clout== (stuff ***pulled*** or ***dragged about***; &gt; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 143</sup> √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***become altered for the worse***); — only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחָבוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.38.11|Jer 38:11]]; [[Jer.38.12|Jer 38:12]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלָחִים‎</span>).
